method.name: Bioinformatics-oriented hierarchical evolutionary learning

reference.ref: Jaume Bacardit, Edmund K. and Burke Natalio Krasnogor Improving the scalability of rule-based evolutionary learning Memetic Computing manuscript

generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of a GA-based algorithm.
generalDescription.howWork: This methods is a GA algorithm whose uses the Mitchigan approach.

parameterSpec.param: 1st parameter: seed of the random numbers generator
9th parameter: Number of repetitions for rule learning
17th parameter: Number of strata of ILAS
19th parameter: Number of iterations of MDL

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: Clas-BioHEL Dataset: iris (10 fold cross validation run) Training set: iris-10-1tra.dat to iris-10-10tra.dat Test set: iris-10-1tst.dat to iris-10-10tst.dat Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: default values
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the results/Vis-Clas-Check/TSTClas-BioHEL folder the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.06666666666666667 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.051639777949432225 Correctly classified: 0.9333333333333333 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= Summary of data, Classifiers: Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9407407407407408 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.9481481481481482 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9481481481481482 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9185185185185185 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.05185185185185185 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.013250773199998749 Correctly classified: 0.9481481481481482 Global N/C: 0.0
